name: [LDJAM38] The Thief of Silverkeep
description:
A thief has been stealing things from the citizens of Silverkeep, so they have closed the town gates to stop anything else from being stolen. Help the town find their missing items.

A short relaxing 3D adventure game made in a weekend for the Ludum Dare 38 jam. The theme was "A Small World". Made using Unity3D.
